A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie fails to deliver a clear story. Too many plot lines and jumping around makes it difficult to tell how much time is being covered and ultimately the movie watcher knows who will win and what will happen. It’s nuts to me that such a large production with so much money can fail to deliver a half decent story. It also felt too much like a Marvel comic movie; too many visual effects and attempts to be funny. I felt like Jar Jar was going to pop up. Do better\, Disney.
